div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 189 Eretria, Euboea, 1861 Burial: 250-200 B.C. (Oeconomides, Hackens) Contents: 55+ AR Philip II: 2 post. tetradr. (Amphipolis) Alexander III: 1 dr. (Ephesus) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 1 tetradr. (Sala- mis?) Lysimachus: 1 tetradr. (unc.) Locri Opuntii: 22 triob. Phocis: 9 triob. Boeotia: 1 didr.; 1 dr.; 7 triob. Rhodes: 5 didr.; 3 dr. Ptolemy I: 1 tetradr. Ptolemy II: 1 tetradr. Disposition: Athens 12 (Philip II-Lysi- machus, Ptolemy I, Locri 1, Boeotia 4, Rhodes 1) Information from M. Oeconomides
